core.exceptions package¶

core.exceptions.exceptions module¶

async core.exceptions.exceptions.base_exception_handler(request: starlette.requests.Request, e: fastapi.exceptions.HTTPException)¶
core.exceptions.exceptions.generate_error_dict(error_arr: list, errors_dict: dict, temp_dict: dict) → dict¶

A recursive function for iterate on dictionary and match key values

Args:
error_arr (list): list of error list errors_dict (dict): dictionary of errors temp_dict (dict): temp dict of error values for matching with error key
Returns:
dict: value of error key for update or add new one
async core.exceptions.exceptions.http_422_error_handler(request: starlette.requests.Request, exc: fastapi.exceptions.RequestValidationError)¶

Handler for 422 error to transform default pydantic error object to custom format

async core.exceptions.exceptions.http_500_error_handler(request: starlette.requests.Request, exc: Exception)¶
async core.exceptions.exceptions.http_duplicate_error_handler(request: starlette.requests.Request, exc: pymongo.errors.DuplicateKeyError)¶
